short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows importing Yu-Gi-Oh decks into Cardmarket's wantlists using YDK and such

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to easily create big want lists on Cardmarket using YDK files, YDKE codes and Deck lists (e.g. from Cardcluster). You will be able to remove cards from the original deck list, and even modify the amount of each card you really want. Once you are done with the deck list, simply press "Import" in order to insert the text into the textarea, and you will be good to go.

You can also export your want list, fully or partially, in order to share it with your friends.
